faq1.question: Why download Threads videos and photos?
faq1.answer: Many young people come to Threads to share a private story with specific audiences and followers through videos. So, download those videos and you will get lots of unique exclusive content to rewatch and repost to Twitter, Instagram, or Facebook.

faq2.question: Can I download a video on Threads directly?
faq2.answer: Threads only supports saving and spinning a video on the feed, not downloading it directly to your personal device. So, you need a third party Thread downloader to make it done.

faq3.question: How can I download a Threads video on iPhone/Android?
answer: On the Threads app, tap on the direct symbol under the post the choose copy link
Open Snapsave.app by a browser then choose Threads downloader
Paste the link to the toolbar and tap the download button
Hit the download button again then save it to your device

faq4.question: Do the creators know if I downloaded their content on Threads?
faq4.answer: No, they don’t. With our Thread video downloader you can download videos, pictures, audio on Threads anonymously.

faq5.question: Is it legal to download Threads videos?
faq5.answer: Yes, it is legal to save Threads videos for purposes like rewatching, memories save. Please consider the copyright issues if you want to reuse the content.

faq6.question: Do you put watermarks on downloaded Threads videos?
faq6.answer: No, we don’t. Snapsave doesn’t impose a watermark on the photos, or clips you download here.

faq7.question: What should I do if a Threads video download fails?
faq7.answer: Our tool might encounter overloaded performance, leading to download failure. Please try again by F5 or contact technical support for help.
